channel.title: logging on Website of Chris König
channel.description: Recent content in logging on Website of Chris König

item.title: WebApi Logging Part 2: Correlation-ID with ASP.NET Core WebApi and NLog
item.description: A correlation-ID is mostly the same like an transaction-id in the SQL World. I use it for logging and error analysis. Whithout a correlation id you are totaly lost in your log!

item.title: WebApi Logging Part 1: Api Setup with Nlog and JSON Config
item.description: This series should show you, how to use NLog in an asp.net core web api. Setup the project The Basic setup of this project is descibed in my last blogpost. (there u see also, how to setup NLog with a JSON config)
